PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Leveling :
Orb of Storms / Frost bomb / Stormblast mine until lvl 16
Act 2 : Orb of Storms / Wave of Conviction / Stormblast mine Use : Replica Tasalio's sign / Replica Prismweave / Replica Karui Warm (Fleetfoot anoint) / Ring craft wands (craft fire and lightning res on it)
Lvl 38 : Use final setup to level 100
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Required items :
Void batteries : 40c x 2 | https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Heist/nV8zt0 | 80c total Carcass Jack 6L : https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Heist/yG5VXWIR | 3.6ex Crown of The Inward Eye +1 PC : https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Heist/pJmR0gwH0 | 1.5ex (Bench craft 4 sockets / 4L / 1red until you hit 1B3R) Rare gloves damage/conversion : https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Heist/L9jVqr7hn | 30c Craft 25% cold conversion on bench (1divine) Replica Inya's Epiphany : https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Heist/2d4PJzDFk | 2c (Enchant them when you Uber lab with Twice enchanted) The Pandemonius : Anoint Winter Spirit + Elemental Catalysts for 24% pen | https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Heist/VapXip | 1Ex Rare ring with life/res : https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Heist/7jwJ3myT5 | Craft -9 Mana cost of non-chanelling skills | Resist catalyst | 1ex Circle of Fear : https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Heist/BBwaYewu8 | 30c Stygian : https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Heist/e2LGWYcL | 1ex Abyss Jewel : https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Heist/v0LWnD9SE | 5c
Atziri's promise : https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Heist/QzaRfw | 10c Cinderswallow : https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Heist/a39Yzjhe | 50c (Swap to Taste of Life flask for Sirus)
---------------------------------------- Jewels :
Watcher's eye -> Hatred Phys to cold conversion | https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Heist/RL7qOc7 | 5ex Militant Faith -> https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Heist/LgEPPb7in | 1ex (If price goes up, get one with non-curse aura effect / dominus for cheap) Large Cluster | Doryani's Lesson + Vengeful (cheapest) | https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Heist/44MJXWkH9 | 20c Medium Cluster | https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Heist/B9RXVakC8 | 1.2ex Medium Cluster 2 | https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Heist/pKwYKk5S0 | 50c Corrupted blood Jewel : https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Heist/YbQGgviY | 35c Res Jewel : https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Heist/Q2aKnZRHw | 20/30c Damage Jewel : https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Heist/QLKod5RCw | 40c *3
TOTAL : 23EX (18 if you want to start without Watchers, should be FIRST purchage)
What to upgrade first : Explody chest -> Blanketed Snow + Doryani's lesson jewel -> Bottled Faith -> 2nd Cluster setup (check my profile) -> Headhunter -> Badge -> Helmet -> +1PC Ring
TWITCH PRIME BTW
